name: Chardet
body:
Chardet is a Python port of the C++ [universal character encoding detector from Mozilla](https://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/file/bc7deafdac4b/extensions/universalchardet).

### Installation
Chardet is [available on PyPI](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/chardet) and can be installed via [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/latest/):

```
pip install chardet
``` 

### Authors and Contributors
Chardet was originally ported from C++ by Mark Pilgrim (@diveintomark).  It is now maintained by Dan Blanchard (@dan-blanchard) and Ian Cordasco (@sigmavirus24), and was formerly maintained by Erik Rose (@erikrose).

### Documentation
We are currently working on updating our documentation, but an old (and still mostly correct) version of the documentation last updated by Mark Pilgrim is available [here](https://chardet.github.io/chardet/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
